comment: Confusing teaching methods, but just show up to class, read the assigned material and participate actively in class, study for the tests and you have an A. Not a difficult class.

i had this professor for honors world litt. i dont know what everyone else is talking about, she was extremely easy and very kind. hardly had to write anything. your grade pretty much came from participating. just show up and talk about the book. easy. o, and there's a paper at the end, but its only 3-4 pgs and its all your opinion,comparing 2 bks
Boring and a bit condescending. She likes to focus more on the little nitpicky details of books than on themes or symbols or what it said about other cultures. Also tend to talk ALOT about religion.

She is absolutely ridiculous. Her teaching methods are out dated, she's completely boring, and she likes to think she's very deep and thought provoking, where as in all actuality she's completely befuddling. I would NEVER EVER take her again.
